nodes.text: Jedi healers were healers within the Jedi Order. Healers frequently possessed the ability of Force healing. Organizations such as the Circle of Jedi Healers and the Medical Corps counted Jedi healers among their ranks. During the High Republic Era, Jedi Master and healer Torban Buck was stationed onboard the Padawan Academic Cruiser Star Hopper to teach the starship's class of Padawans first aid. In the final years of the Republic Era, Stass Allie was another notable Jedi healer.
